CREATE TABLE Aml_Exchange_Rate (auto_id VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,main_currency_code VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL,converted_currency VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL,exchange_rate DECIMAL(20,8),update_date DateTime,PRIMARY KEY (auto_id));
